DOC.brief_summary: Carbon-12 carbon-13 naturally-occurring isotope find exhale breath . Investigators prove 13CO2/12CO2 breath delta value ( BDV ) change subject negative energy balance feed positive energy balance meal . Measuring one liter exhale breath daily may convenient way measure negative positive energy balance patient receive intravenous nutrition .
DOC.brief_title: Using Exhaled Air Determine Changes Nutritional Status Patients Intravenous Nutrition
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , pilot study determine change 12C/13C BDV day 0-7 patient receive parenteral nutrition . Investigators recruit subject inpatient unit University Wisconsin Hospital Clinics whose primary team consult Nutrition Support Team institute parenteral nutrition clinical reason . Subjects clinical indication parenteral nutrition moderately severely malnourish due little nutrition mean ( oral nutrition nutrition per tube ) period time ( 0-10 day base state nourishment prior admission ) . Investigators record baseline nutritional status medical record note ( dietitian , Nutrition Support Team , etc . ) , well medication , demographic information medical history . Investigators take baseline exhale CO2 measurement daily measurement approximately time daily ( +/- hour ) . The daily exhale 12C/13C breath delta value match subject ' daily caloric intake parenteral nutrition ( oral nutrition nutrition per tube , applicable ) . The breath delta value , caloric intake , plus subject ' degree malnourishment parameter build research . Investigators hypothesize breath delta value increase baseline stabilize patient reach goal energy need define Nutrition Support Team .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age older Anticipated start parenteral nutrition Expected duration stay least 5 day enrollment Subject speak English Subjects inability take adequate oral nutrition develop developed malnutrition require parenteral nutrition Subjects unable coordinate well enough give 1 liter breath sample Subjects receive parenteral nutrition prior admission Subjects pregnant Subjects prisoner Subjects pharmacologically sedate altered consciousness Subjects mechanically ventilate Subjects admit bone marrow stem cell transplant Known participation another interventional research study within 30 day prior enrollment ( note : eligible , interventional treatment must end least 30 day ago ) Subjects disease state clinical condition make study candidate , per primary investigator 's discretion
